articles.title: 2nd Alaska health care worker has adverse reaction after coronavirus vaccine - 10TV
articles.description: Unlike a few similar cases reported in Britain, the Alaska woman had no history of allergic reactions.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Health officials in Alaska have reported that a second health care worker had an adverse reaction to a COVID-19 vaccine.
